review.description: A bad assmar attack had Ryan in the ER (he's fine) and I got tired of the waiting room. I decided to visit my friend over at ABP (and by friend, I mean guy who works there who once made me want to strangle him). My visit wasn't nearly as bad this time... I made sure I paid in *exact* cash and I asked for something fairly simple (cappuccino). The guy made a latte which didn't really have any foam after he stirred it for about a minute (?), but it was the caffeine I needed and it tasted fine.
review.author: Haley C.
